category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: REQ_enable_implicit_reserve
preference.preference_description: Controls automatic check-out when a user starts editing a requirement in Active Workspace Documentation page. The checked out requirement will be automatically checked in when user saves the requirements. Valid values are: true : the requirements are automatically checked out when user starts editing and checked in when document is saved. false: the requirements are not checked out when user starts editing. This is the default value.
